you need to add $userId to the key for caching.
now the method is not working correctly.
regardless of $userId, it always returns the first cached role

https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/commit/a97934fd9230f44bd95d614ee3436d487545118b#r94123292

@manchenkoff

issue.title: Added $userId usage for RBAC cache key

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Is bugfix?    | ✔️
| New feature?  | ❌
| Breaks BC?    | ❌
| Fixed issues  | #15376, #19725

I've added `$userId` usage for the key-building function to store RBAC role info. Also, introduced an additional array for the invalidation process which keeps all cached user ids list to clear on invalidate calls.

P.S.
Unit test in this PR was copied from #19725 by @lav45.
